findings.title: Short termination or notice windows
findings.rationale: Short or strict notice windows can lead to accidental renewals or unintended termination.
findings.matched_excerpt: ...6. TERM AND TERMINATION This Agreement may be terminated by mutual agreement or by either party with 30 days notice....
findings.context:
LIABILITY
Provider's liability is limited to the fees paid in the 6 months preceding the claim.

6. TERM AND TERMINATION
This Agreement may be terminated by mutual agreement or by either party with 30 days notice.

7. CONFIDENTIALITY
Confidentiality obligations survive termination for 3 years.

8. WARRANTIES
Provider disclaims all warranties, express or implied, except as specifically stated.

9. DISPU

findings.title: Late fees / high interest
findings.rationale: Penalty terms can increase costs if payment timing slips.
findings.matched_excerpt: ...2. PAYMENT TERMS Payment terms are as set forth in the applicable Statement of Work. Late payments incur a 3% monthly fee....
findings.context:
t Company ("Client").

1. SERVICES
Provider agrees to provide the services described in attached Statements of Work.

2. PAYMENT TERMS
Payment terms are as set forth in the applicable Statement of Work. Late payments incur a 3% monthly fee.

3. INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY
Provider grants Client a worldwide, perpetual, exclusive license to use all deliverables for any purpose.

4. INDEMNIFICATION
Provider shall indemnify Client

changes: Added 8 high-signal rules (attorneys fees, liability cap carveouts, assignment restrictions, etc.)
Implemented clause-level anchoring and false-positive suppression
